Html:
Using the ISO960 reference order, the citations appear in '(' and ')'. For example:

In this work (1), we write...

However, I want to change it to [1]. So, how can I replace the '(' with '[' and ')' with ']' in the xml file? where should I modify?

If this is a BibWord style file, see the BibWord FAQ

If this is one of the styles that comes with Word, see the general FAQ
